column2: Grant [Root.GetTitledFirstName] the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the highest honor a President is able to give.
President [mf_giver.GetDynName] has granted me the prestigous honor of the Medal of Freedom.
This Americanist has received the Presidential Medal of Freedom, a high honor given to those who have proven themselves through service to the faith, the President, or to Americanists as a whole.
